equals

public boolean equals(Sprite s)
Compares two Sprites. If the Sprites occupy the same spot, the method returns true, otherwise the method returns false.

Parameters:
s - The other Sprite to be compared.
Returns:
true if the Sprites have the same coordinates, false if otherwise.
